name: Green Bean Casserole
ingredients: 3 cans of green beans (drained) 1 c. whipping cream
1 large can of mushrooms (drained0 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 onion (chopped) 1 can of cream of mushroom soup
3 cans green beans boiled and drained
16 oz. sour cream 1 1/2 tsp lemon pepper
steps: Pour green beans on the bottom of a 9x13 baking pan. Combine reamining ingredients into a sauce pan
(cut up onion and mushrooms). Saute for 5 minutes over medium heat. Pour sauce over green beans. Bake
at 350 for 40 minutes. Sprinkle Dried French Fried Onions on top and bake for 5-­‐10 minutes more -­‐ until
pepper to taste 1 tsp dill weed
Heat flour, sour cream, chives, lemon pepper and dill weed together until heated through. Mix with green beans
in a casserole dish. Cover with cheese and sprinkle with paprika.
